original_title: スーパーマリオワールド マリオとヨッシーの冒険ランド
overview: This is an interactive anime video based on the game Super Mario World. It is designed for use with Bandai's Terebikko system, which utilizes a telephone-shaped microphone to "interact" with the video. It asks the viewer multiple choice questions, such as what will hatch from Yoshi's egg.
title: Super Mario World: Mario & Yoshi's Adventure Land
